title: PC market, minimum wage causes unemployment

content.question: In a perfectly competitive labor market, an increase in an effective minimum wage will result in

choices.label: an increase in the supply of workers
a decrease in the supply of workers
a decrease in the demand for workers

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

topic.text: 6.4: The Effects of Government Intervention in Different Market Structures

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
